letters.description: Identify and acknowledge codependent patterns, triggers, and their impact on relationships and well-being.
Learn to recognize healthy and unhealthy boundaries, understand personal boundary needs, and practice assertive communication.
Explore unmet emotional needs, develop self-compassion, and learn to prioritize self-care and emotional regulation skills.
Cultivate a sense of self, foster healthy interdependence, and establish fulfilling relationships based on mutual respect and autonomy.
Build coping mechanisms, process past traumas, and create a sustainable plan for ongoing recovery and personal growth.
